Package Business

  • Class Summary
    Class Description
    PlayModel
    The type Play model will be used whenever we need to play any song along the game.
    SongModel
    The type Song model will be used by the Playlist Controller, relating our Controller to the Database Manager.
    StatisticsModel
    The type Statistics model will be used by the Statistics Controller, relating our Controller to the Database Manager.
    UserModel
    The Type User Model will create the bridge between our Users and the Database, managing things like the logic behind the Register and Login Validations, by means of the following Regex expressions:
    WebScrapper
    The type Web scrapper will be extremely useful to help our User Download automatically by groups of 10, all songs from the Official Website that our game uses.
    WebScrapperUpdateController
    The type Web scrapper update controller will be used to control the time between every update from the WebScrapper as this should be done continuously while the game is running.
  • Exception Summary
    Exception Description
    LoginException
    The type Login exception.
    RegisterException
    The type Register exception.
    UserException
    The type User exception will be the main exception containing the general message to be complemented when being extended by the RegisterException or the LoginException.
